'''Geo Treasure Compass''' is a [[Treasure Compass|treasure compass]] [[gadget]] that can be used to search for nearby [[chests]] in [[Liyue]]. It can be created through [[forging]] after using the [[Diagram: Geo Treasure Compass|diagram]] obtained by reaching [[Reputation]] Level 6 in Liyue.

{{Transclude|Treasure Compass|compass intro|section=1}}

|Golden Raven Insignia = 10
|Cor Lapis = 30
|Crystal Chunk = 50
|Mora = 50,000
|time = 30s
|sort = Golden Raven Insignia;Cor Lapis;Crystal Chunk;Mora
}}

{{Transclude|Treasure Compass|Gameplay Notes}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A handy tool used to locate nearby chests. The land of [[Geo]] is rich with valuable resources, with treasures hidden throughout the mountains and wilderness just waiting to be found. Every [[Treasure Hoarder]] around dreams of getting their hands on a magical compass like this.|[[Archive]]}}
